feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for Oklahoma Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Heat Advisory issued July 26 at 4:34PM CDT until July 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... A HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING. * TEMPERATURES... HEAT INDEX VALUES AROUND 105 ARE EXPECTED THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING. * IMPACTS... THOSE EXPOSED TO THE EXTREME HEAT OVER A PROLONGED PERIOD MAY DEVELOP HEAT RELATED ILLNESSES.

entry.title: Heat Advisory issued July 26 at 4:34PM CDT until July 27 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT SUNDAY... THE HEAT ADVISORY IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT SUNDAY. * TEMPERATURES... AFTERNOON HEAT INDEX VALUES AROUND 105 ARE EXPECTED AGAIN ON SUNDAY. * IMPACTS... THOSE EXPOSED TO THE EXTREME HEAT OVER A PROLONGED PERIOD MAY DEVELOP HEAT RELATED ILLNESSES.

entry.title: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 26 at 4:03PM CDT until July 27 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT SUNDAY... AN EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IS IN EFFECT... FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES... * IN OKLAHOMA...TULSA...PAWNEE AND OSAGE. HAZARDOUS WEATHER... * AFTERNOON HEAT INDEX VALUES MAY REACH NEAR 105 AGAIN SUNDAY

entry.title: Heat Advisory issued July 26 at 3:05PM CDT until July 26 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * EVENT...TEMPERATURES AROUND 105 DEGREES WILL CONTINUE LATE THIS AFTERNOON AND EARLY THIS EVENING IN PALO DURO CANYON AND ACROSS PARTS OF THE NORTH CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE AND THE CENTRAL OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE. * TIMING...TRIPPLE DIGIT TEMPERATURES WILL CONTINUE ACROSS THE AREA
